ModMetaData.name: Tu Tiên - Basic Pack
ModMetaData.author: TuTienMod
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a cultivation system to RimWorld. Pawns can cultivate their spiritual energy (Qi), advance through realms and stages, learn cultivation techniques, and become powerful cultivators.
Features: - Cultivation realms: Mortal → Qi Condensation → Foundation Establishment → Golden Core - Talent system affecting cultivation speed and breakthrough chances - Qi system with regeneration and consumption - Stage-based skills and abilities - Cultivation techniques for enhanced combat abilities - NPC cultivators with random techniques
Compatible with existing saves.
